Package org.as2lib.ant

Class Summary
As2api As2api generates HTML API documentation from ActionScript 2 source code with As2api.
As2api.Pazkage Pazkage represents a package.
Mtasc Mtasc compiles ActionScript 2 classes with the Motion-Twin ActionScript Compiler MTASC in Apache Ant as Ant Task.
Mtasc.Argument Argument represents a custom argument you may add to leverage functionalites offered by enhanced MTASC compilers like HAMTASC.
Swf Swf creates swf files with the XML-based SWF Processing Tool (Swfmill), that enables the inclusion of symbols, and compiles classes into this swf using the Motion-Twin ActionScript 2.0 Compiler (MTASC).
Swf.Clip Clip represents a clip library symbol.
Swf.Font Font represents a font library symbol to include in the swf.
Swf.Import Import represents a shared library import.
Swf.Symbol Symbol represents a library symbol that consists of an id (identifier) corresponding to a movieclip, image or font.
Swf.Xml Xml represents the swfmill xml data.
Swfmill Swfmill is an ant task for swfmill that converts xml to swf and vice versa.
Swfmill.Command Command allows only for an enumerated set of string values to be set.
Swfsli Swfsli allows to add/modify/remove the "ScriptLimits" tag of a SWF file.
UnitTest UnitTest executes a unit test swf and writes the result to the console.
